items.name: Watermelon Margarita
items.recipe:
2 oz Pedro Morales
3/4 oz Triple Sec
1 oz Lime juice
1/2 oz Agave nectar
1.5 oz Watermelon Puree
Fresh watermelon

Muddle fresh watermelon, add rest, shake hard, dirty-pour in Collins with Tajín rim. Garnish watermelon dusted with Tajín.

items.name: Rreal Margarita
items.recipe:
2 oz Well Tequila – 3/4 oz Triple Sec – 1 oz Lime Juice – 3/4 oz Agave
Rocks glass, full-salt rim, dried lime wheel.

items.name: Premium Margarita
items.recipe:
2 oz Jose Cuervo Tradicional Reposado
3/4 oz Triple Sec
1 oz Lime Juice
3/4 oz Agave
Rocks glass, ½-salt rim (black salt), dried lime wheel.

items.name: Mezcalita
items.recipe:
2 oz 400 Conejos Espadín Mezcal – ¾ oz Triple Sec – 1 oz Lime Juice – 3/4 oz Agave
Rocks glass, full Tajín rim, dried grapefruit.

items.name: Texas Margarita
items.recipe:
2 oz Corazón de Agave Reposado – 1 oz Lime – 3/4 oz Agave – 1/2 oz Grand Marnier floater
Rocks glass, salt rim, dehydrated orange wheel.

items.name: Paloma
items.recipe:
3 oz Dulce Vida Grapefruit
3/4 oz Triple Sec
1 oz Lime Juice
3/4 oz Agave
Muddle grapefruit slice, dirty-pour, highball, Tajín rim, rosemary sprig.

items.name: Hennessy Margarita
items.recipe:
2 oz Hennessy Cognac – 3/4 oz Triple Sec – 1 oz Lime – 3/4 oz Agave
Rocks glass, salt rim, dried orange wheel.

items.name: Margarita Pitcher
items.recipe: 60 oz (sirve 5). Multiplicá la receta base ×5. Garnish: corona de 3 hojas de piña + ruedas de lima y naranja + flores comestibles.

items.name: Peach Margarita
items.recipe:
2 oz El Jimador Blanco
1.5 oz Peach Mix
3/4 oz Peach Schnapps
1/2 oz Agave
3/4 oz Lime. Shake, strain, Tajín rim, garnish grapefruit wheel.

items.name: Strawberry Margarita
items.recipe: Rreal Margarita + 1/2 oz Strawberry Puree. Rocks glass, full-salt rim, dried lime.

items.name: Mango Margarita
items.recipe: Rreal Margarita + 1/2 oz Mango Puree. Rocks glass, full-salt rim (Tajín). Garnish dried grapefruit.

items.name: Vinorita
items.recipe:
1 oz Well Tequila – 3/4 oz Triple Sec – 1.5 oz Red Wine – 1/4 oz Passion Fruit Puree – 1 oz Lime – 3/4 oz Agave
Rocks glass, sugar rim, dried lime, dirty-pour.

items.name: Spicy Pineapple Margarita
items.recipe:
2 oz Spicy Tequila – 1 oz Lime – 1/2 oz Agave – 1/2 oz Coconut Syrup – Pineapple wedge.
Blend; rocks glass, Tajín rim, dried pineapple + leaf.

items.name: Fresco Cucumber
items.recipe:
2 oz Well Tequila – 1 oz Lime – 1 oz Cucumber Juice – 3/4 oz Agave – 3-4 Mint leaves.
Rocks glass, Tajín rim, cucumber wheels + mint.

items.name: Mojito
items.recipe: 2 oz White Rum – 1 oz Lime – 3/4 oz Agave – 6-8 mint leaves. Shake, dirty-pour, top Club Soda, garnish lime + mint.

items.name: Sangria
items.recipe: 14 oz house sangria on ice. Garnish edible flower + orange wheel.

items.name: Michelada
items.recipe: 6 oz Michelada Mix + splash Lime + Beer of choice. Mug, Tajín rim + banderilla candy.

items.name: Frozen Margarita
items.recipe: Mason jar full, salt rim (Tajín on mango). Agregá 3/4 oz puree encima para saborizado.

items.name: Margarita Flight
items.recipe: 4×3 oz: House (black salt + duck), Passion Fruit (salt + dried lime), Strawberry (sugar rim + rosemary), Mango (Tajín + dried grapefruit).

items.name: Titanic Flight
items.recipe: 10 shots House Tequila $50 · Herradura Silver $75 · Casamigos Cristalino $100 · Clase Azul $300.

items.name: Flavored Titanic
items.recipe: 4×1 oz Mango Margarita + 4×1 oz Passion Fruit Margarita + 4×1 oz Strawberry Margarita.

items.name: Clase Azul Margarita
items.recipe: 2 oz Clase Azul Reposado – 1 oz Licor de Naranja – 3/4 oz Agave – 1 oz Lime. Sugar-skull mug, garnish orange + mint.

items.name: Skinny Margarita
items.recipe: 2 oz House Tequila – 1 oz Lime – 1/2 oz Agave. Rocks glass, salt rim, dried orange.

items.name: Mango Frozen Margarita
items.recipe: Frozen base + Mango Puree, Tajín rim, garnish dehydrated grapefruit.

items.name: Strawberry Frozen Margarita
items.recipe: Frozen base + Strawberry Puree, salt rim, garnish dried lime.

items.name: Passionfruit Frozen Margarita
items.recipe: Frozen base + Passion Fruit Puree, salt rim, garnish dried lime.

items.name: Sangria Swirl Frozen Margarita
items.recipe: Frozen Margarita + 1/2 oz House Sangria. Mason jar, full-salt rim, dried lime.

items.name: Mexican Mule
items.recipe: 1 oz Lime – 2 oz 400 Conejos – 1/2 oz Agave. Shake, top Ginger Beer in mule cup, garnish mint.

items.name: Espresso Martini
items.recipe: 1.5 oz Corazón Reposado – 1 oz Espresso Liqueur – 0.5 oz Agave – 1 oz Cold-Brew. Shake, coupe, garnish 3 coffee beans.

items.name: Hibiscus Cosmopolitan
items.recipe: 2 oz Vodka – 3/4 oz Licor Naranja – 3/4 oz Lime – 1 oz Hibiscus Syrup. Shake, martini glass, garnish edible flower.

items.name: Bourbon Smash
items.recipe: 2 oz Buffalo Trace – 2 oz sweet iced-tea – 1/4 oz Agave – 3 lime wedges – Mint. Muddle, shake, pour, garnish mint.

items.name: Old Fashioned
items.recipe: 2 oz Old Forester – 1 dash Angostura – 1 dash Orange bitters – 1/4 oz Agave – muddled orange + cherry. Stir, big ice, garnish peel + cherry.

items.name: Strawberry & Watermelon Mocktail
items.recipe: Muddle watermelon + strawberry – 2 oz Water – 1 oz Lime – 1/2 oz Strawberry Monin – 1/2 oz Watermelon Puree, top Club Soda. Collins, Tajín rim, garnish dehydrated lime.

items.name: Mango & Pineapple Mocktail
items.recipe: 2 oz Water – 1.5 oz Pineapple Juice – 1 oz Lime – 1/2 oz Mango Monin – 1/2 oz Agave, top Club Soda. Collins, Tajín rim, garnish dehydrated grapefruit.

items.name: Cucumber & Mint Mocktail
items.recipe: 2 oz Water – 1 oz Lime – 1 oz Cucumber Juice – 3/4 oz Agave – Mint – top Club Soda. Collins, Tajín rim.

items.name: Checklist
items.recipe:
- Setup bar mats
- 2 ice-wells con hielo, licor, purés, jugos, shakers
- Refill straws, frutas, garnish
- Cortar lime wheels & grapefruit p/ deshidratar
- Prep lime juice y fruit tray
- Prep batches
- Basura y cajas fuera, deliveries ordenados, todo rotulado — la barra queda lista para PM shift.

items.name: Checklist
items.recipe:
- Restock liquor & beer
- Break down boxes & trash
- Ayudar al bartender AM si quedó algo pendiente.

items.name: Checklist
items.recipe:
- Vaciar y secar ice-wells
- Lavar tools & mats
- Wipe every bottle
- Tapar frutas/botellas y refrigerar
- Sanitizar superficies
- Sweep, mop, basura
- Stools upside-down
- Llevar tools sucias al dish en lotes pequeños.
